text:
SEEKING WORK

Location: Krakow, Poland (https://goo.gl/F85IAd)

Remote: yes

Travel: yes

We're a Full Stack Software House focuses on build your product quickly to accelerate your technology roadmap. We help steer your projects towards a successful outcome by offering support and advice to make sure you get the outcome you want. We are comfortable with all aspects of web apps development, front-end, back-end and DevOps.

What we do?

Servers - AWS, Apache2, Nginx, Varnish, Docker, Ansible, Vagrant

Databases - MySql, MongonDB, Redis, CouchDB, Cassandra

Frameworks - Symfony, Yii, Zend, React, Angular, Backbone.js, Node.js

Libraries - D3.js, Yarn, Composer, Redux, Sentry, Passport.js, LESS/SCSS/SASS, Grunt/Gulp/Webpack and many more...

Let's talk! How can we help?

Person: Bart Majewski

Email: bart.majewski@codibly.com

Mobile: +48609546039

WWW: http://www.codibly.com
